root.name: Tales of Monkey Island Chapter 3: Lair of the Leviathan
root.description: It picks up after the stunning conclusion of the second episode, in which our hero, Guybrush Threepwood, was swallowed whole with his ship by a giant manatee. He must work to escape the belly of the beast to continue his quest for Le Esponga Grande, a magical sponge that will cure the "Pox". The game introduces Pirate Face-Off as a way of "fighting". The contestants must in turn make their most intimidating pirate faces, and whoever can make the most original pirate face wins. PC Requirements Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/Windows 7Processor: 2.0 Ghz or better (3 GHz Pentium® 4 or equivalent recommended)Memory: 512 MB RAM (1GB recommended)Hard Disk Space: 310 MBVideo Card: 64 MB DirectX® 8.1 compliant video card (128 MB recommended)Sound Card: DirectX® 8.1 sound deviceDirectX® Version: DirectX® Version 9.0c or better (DirectX updater included)Controller Support: Yes No internet connection required to play
